overview: Features  Taking your freeriding skills to the next level, this DVD features how-to instructions on nearly every aspect of freeriding  Covering neutral position, bike/body seperation, pressure control, braking, eye movement, riding skinnies, manual front wheel lifts, hucking and more  Techniques for advanced cornering, rolling drops and keeping the flow on the trail  Special features include: freeride bike setup, responding to accidents, certification training for ride leaders, guides and instructors  Also features SAINT, Shimano's freerider group, Ryan Leech's trials techniques, Mad March racing program, Gleneagle adventure park and rider profiles  Digitally mastered sound and video; running length: 67 minutes; copyright 2005, West Coast Style
title: West Coast Style - Freeride Fundamentals
